MS MCQs

    Get started with AI Builder Text recognition

    »

    1. What are the capabilities of AI Builder Text recognition?

      Recognize printed characters on a picture.

      Recognize printed and handwritten characters on a picture.

      Recognize symbols and printed and handwritten characters on a picture.


    2. Which Azure service is powering AI Builder Text recognition technology?

      Azure Entity Recognition

      Azure Image Analysis

      Azure OCR


    3. How can you retrieve the text that is recognized in a Power Apps canvas app?

      From OneDrive

      By taking a picture or uploading one from a local disk

      From Microsoft Dataverse


    4. Is the AI Builder Text Recognizer component available from a model-driven Power App?

      Yes

      No
